skills.title: Front-End Development
skills.description: Skilled in creating responsive UIs with React, HTML, and CSS. Experienced in state management with Redux and modern JavaScript frameworks.

skills.title: Back-End Development
skills.description: Proficient in building server-side applications with Node.js, Express, and RESTful APIs. Experienced with database integration and secure backends.

skills.title: UI/UX Design
skills.description: Adept at designing intuitive interfaces and user experiences. Skilled in translating concepts into functional, user-friendly designs.

skills.title: Database Management
skills.description: Experienced in managing MongoDB and SQL databases. Skilled in schema design, writing queries, and ensuring data efficiency.

portfolio.title: Quora Clone
portfolio.description: This is and react application, Used Redux for global state management. Using React-Router-Dom different pages are served. Login page, Home page, Add question popup page, Question details page and Unanwered Questions page are the main pages of the application

portfolio.title: Movie streaming app
portfolio.description: Fullstack open source movie application made with MongoDB, Express, React & Node.js (MERN). Features include user registration and login, authentication using JWT tokens, adding and deleting favorites, leaving and deleting reviews, password update, live search, trailer watch on YouTube, 404 page, skeleton loading effect, dark mode, responsive design, and more.
portfolio.tech: React, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, JWT, Redux, Material UI, Axios, TMDB API

portfolio.title: Student management app
portfolio.description: The Student Management System is a full-stack application designed to streamline the process of managing student records. It allows users to perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for student data.
portfolio.tech: React, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB,  Redux, Axios

portfolio.title: ONLINE EXAM APPLICATION
portfolio.description: Developed a full-stack application where users can take mock tests for government exams (e.g., Railways - Group D). Features include test evaluation, PDF downloads for results, and role-specific test recommendations.

portfolio.title: TASTEBUDS - FOOD DELIVERY APP
portfolio.description: Built a food delivery app with an integrated payment gateway for seamless order processing. The app allows users to browse menus, place orders, and track deliveries in real time.

portfolio.title: EMBROIDERY DESIGN ORDERING SYSTEM
portfolio.description: A platform for ordering custom embroidery designs, integrated with WhatsApp for direct order communication.

portfolio.title: META CLONE
portfolio.description: Developed a real-time clone of Meta applications, featuring live updates and a design closely mirroring the original platform.

portfolio.title: Job vista
portfolio.description: Job Vista is an intuitive and user-friendly job hunt application built to help job seekers find and apply for their ideal roles. The app allows users to browse through job listings, filter results based on their preferences, and submit applications directly through the platform.
